com.jweb.dao

Class NewsletterDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jweb.dao.DAO
      • com.jweb.dao.NewsletterDAO

  • public class NewsletterDAO
extends DAO
    The newsletter Data Access Object : create, read, update or delete a newsletter. Extends the DAO abstract class.
    Author:
    Julie
    See Also:
    DAO, DAOException

      • addSuscriber

        public void addSuscriber(java.lang.String email)
                  throws DAOException
        Tries to add an email to the database. Check if the address doesn't already exist into the database, otherwise it throws a DBException.
        Parameters:
        email -
        choice -
        Throws:
        DAOException

      • deleteSuscriber

        public void deleteSuscriber(java.lang.String email)
                     throws DAOException
        Tries to delete an email from the database. Check if the address really exists into the database, otherwise it throws a DBException
        Parameters:
        email -
        Throws:
        DAOException
